summary: This document is an email chain from August 29, 2019, forwarding a Bureau of Prisons (BOP) response to a preservation request from Jeffrey Epstein's counsel. The request, sent by attorney Martin G. Weinberg on behalf of Epstein's family, seeks preservation and production of all records related to Epstein's detention, the July 23, 2019 incident, and his death on August 10, 2019. The BOP acknowledges the preservation request and directs counsel to the FOIA process for production.

events.title: Preservation request sent

locations: New York Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
Boston, MA 02116 (Law office of Martin G. Weinberg)
keyFacts: A detailed preservation request was made by Epstein's family attorney for all records related to Epstein's detention from July 6, 2019, through his death.
The request specifically seeks video from the 9th floor SHU, logs of personnel on duty, inmate interviews, medical records, and any note found in Epstein's cell.
The Bureau of Prisons acknowledged the request but directed counsel to use the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) process for production of documents.
The document references a prior incident on July 23, 2019, investigated as an attempted suicide by Epstein.
The email chain shows official notification of Epstein's death was sent from the MCC Warden on August 10, 2019.
